_header: Will ye wit when and how the feast shall be y-held
Bibliographic Ghosts:
Edinburgh, Royal College of Physicians, Edinburgh MS Cursor Mundi, Northern Homily Cycle , f. 14: entered in error under 104 in Brown and Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown, and Rossell Hope Robbins. The Index of Middle English Verse. New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press, 1943.
_description: The Vernon Life of Mary from the South English Legendary, beginning with a Prologue of 114 lines (formerly 104) — 836 lines in couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Alle ȝe wetyn whan & how þe feste chal ben holdeof
                    oure ladyes concepcioun as þe boke vs tolde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& þus þey come togedere þat sondrid were so
                    longIesus schelde vs from pyne of helle þat is so stronge
Bod779.Note:
Includes what was formerly 104 as if part of
                    same text, without heading or break.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
WElle ȝe wite whonne and hou þe feste schal ben
                    iholdeÞe Concepcion of vr Ladi as a Maister me
                    tolde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Ion hire was a trewe feere and nolde nouȝt fro hire goHe
                    loked hire as his ladi deore and what heo wolde hit was ido
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLSto949.First Lines: Wolle we witen whanne & whou þe feste schal ben yholdeþe Concepcioun of vr lady as þe bok vs tolde…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …Alle þat habbeþ yherde of our leuedyis concepciounOf here synnes god hem ȝiue þoru is grace Remissioun

Lam223.First Lines:
WOle ȝe now wete when & how þe fest shal be
                    holdeÞe concepcioun of our lady as þe boke vs telles
                    tolde…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Alle þat han herde of our ladyes concepcionOf her synnes
                    god hem graunte full remissioun Amen
